label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_005
content:
## 2024-04-01 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 83
- Active: 83
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 14
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0
- By Treatment Arm: 
  - Multimodal: 28
  - Standard: 28
  - Placebo: 27

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal: 
  - VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.0
  - VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
  - Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 40.2
  - Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 10.0
  - Six MWT Meters Mean: 307.0
  - Six MWT Meters SD: 36.0
  - Grip Strength kg Mean: 22.5
  - Grip Strength kg SD: 4.4
  - Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.8
  - Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.1
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.1
- Standard: 
  - VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.4
  - VAS Pain Score SD: 1.4
  - Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 46.7
  - Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 10.6
  - Six MWT Meters Mean: 283.0
  - Six MWT Meters SD: 44.0
  - Grip Strength kg Mean: 21.1
  - Grip Strength kg SD: 4.7
  - Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.0
  - Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.3
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 5.4
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.4
- Placebo: 
  - VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.5
  - VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
  - Morphine Equivalents mg Mean: 45.8
  - Morphine Equivalents mg SD: 7.4
  - Six MWT Meters Mean: 253.0
  - Six MWT Meters SD: 56.0
  - Grip Strength kg Mean: 19.3
  - Grip Strength kg SD: 4.8
  - Sleep Quality Index Mean: 3.7
  - Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.5
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 6.9
  - Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.3

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 169
- Sessions Attended: 142
- Attendance Rate %: 90.4

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin g/dL Mean: 13.8
- Hemoglobin g/dL SD: 1.0
- WBC k Mean: 8.0
- WBC k SD: 1.8
- Platelets k Mean: 237
- Platelets k SD: 43
- Serum Creatinine mg/dL Mean: 1.0
- Serum Creatinine mg/dL SD: 0.18
- Blood Glucose mg/dL Mean: 99.0
- Blood Glucose mg/dL SD: 18.0
- ESR mm/hr Mean: 8.0
- ESR mm/hr SD: 8.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-0547, Description: urinary retention, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0565, Description: dry mouth, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-0528, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard

### Protocol Deviations
- No protocol deviations reported.

### Events
- Pain diary electronic collection rate: 95%
- Physical therapy schedule coordinated across 15 sites

### Notes
- Week 5: Pain management assessments on track. 83 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
